rules_text:
When Al, the Second Chance enters the battlefield, create a blue enchantment token named Chance with “If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore one of those results.”
{4}{R}: Transform Al, the Second Chance. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
Flying
Al, the World Mind has indestructible as long as you've rolled a die this turn.
{2}{U}{R}: Roll a d6. Search your library for a card with mana value equal to the result, exile it, then shuffle. You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost this turn.
